thinking: Since the task is to buy a pack of disposable paper plates, the next logical step is to click on the shopping cart to see if any item has added.
The shopping cart is empty as nothing has been added from the online shopping page. I need to go back to the shopping page.
The next logical step is to add a pack of disposable paper plates to the cart.
Added the paper plates to the cart. Now need to verify the order.
Continue to the next step to checkout the item.
Need to fill out the checkout form.
Need to input the phone number, address and place the order.
Input the address and place the order.
The order is placed. Mission accomplished.
